page.title: 04TALISKER DISTILLERY,CARBOST.
page.content: As well as being one of the main tourist attractions,Talisker Distillery provides all year employment in the village.The malt whisky made here is known for its special flavour which many say owes much to the peat flavoured water from the nearby Carbost Burn. Many local people were concerned at recent problems in the whisky industry,causing cutbacks in production and even the closure of distilleries. However the future seems reasonably bright,since the company has been taken over and lots of renovation work has been done.There is now a Visitor's Centre,a car park,and a shop in which the whisky is sold.This should increase the present popularity.
